Repository Name Unauthorized: Madison Museum of Fine Art, Inc.
Notes: Vistors will find original works by well loved artists inlcuding Pablo Picasso, Salvador Dali, James Whistler, and Alexander Calder as well as a fine collection of Asian Budhist art and artifacts dating from the 3rd century and a large collection of hand carved stone Shona sculpture created by the founding fathers of the Shona movement. An outdoor sculpture garden features contemporary sculpture. Continuous art film and a MuseumStore enhance the museum experience. The Museum is located on the historic town square in view of the 1905 domed courthouse and is located along the town's Historic Walking Tour.
